variations.description: Reduces damage taken by 20% and gains a Shield equal to 30% of max Health. For 10s, all damages taken by allies will be directed to Nannar.
Reduces damage taken by 20% and gains a Shield equal to 35% of max Health. For 10s, all damages taken by allies will be directed to Nannar.
Reduces damage taken by 20% and gains a Shield equal to 40% of max Health. For 10s, all damages taken by allies will be directed to Nannar.
Reduces damage taken by 20% and gains a Shield equal to 45% of max Health. For 10s, all damages taken by allies will be directed to Nannar.
Reduces damage taken by 20% and gains a Shield equal to 50% of max Health. For 10s, all damages taken by allies will be directed to Nannar.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 90% of ATK 5 times to all enemies. Dispels enemies' buffs and reduces their Magic DEF by 12% of Nannar's Magic DEF for 10s. Can stack up to 5 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 105% of ATK 5 times to all enemies. Dispels enemies' buffs and reduces their Magic DEF by 12% of Nannar's Magic DEF for 10s. Can stack up to 5 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 120% of ATK 5 times to all enemies. Dispels enemies' buffs and reduces their Magic DEF by 12% of Nannar's Magic DEF for 10s. Can stack up to 5 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 135% of ATK 5 times to all enemies. Dispels enemies' buffs and reduces their Magic DEF by 12% of Nannar's Magic DEF for 10s. Can stack up to 5 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 150% of ATK 5 times to all enemies. Dispels enemies' buffs and reduces their Magic DEF by 12% of Nannar's Magic DEF for 10s. Can stack up to 5 times.
When taking damage, there is a 10% chance to trigger Curse of the Mirror. The effect can only be triggered once in 2s.
When taking damage, there is a 20% chance to trigger Curse of the Mirror. The effect can only be triggered once in 2s.

skins.name: Dream
skins.description: Nannar always talks something cute when in deep slumber.$B$"Ah... I saw...a different reflection in the mirror..."
